name: TOWN OF LEESBURG, VIRGINIA
sampleDescriptions: FAA Reauthorization (HR 2997 and S 1405), remote tower pilot program, Section 610 of HR 2997, the 21st Century Aviation Innovation, Reform, and Reauthorization Act and Section 1206 of S. 1405, Federal
Secure funding to demonstrate and operate a remote air traffic control tower to improve safety and efficiency at Leesburg airport.
